sha256:bfa1c2cc5754862cc8c4df989bb09b09c.name: GetAdminDashboardStats
sha256:bfa1c2cc5754862cc8c4df989bb09b09c.body:
query GetAdminDashboardStats($input: DashboardAnalyticsInput) {
  analyticsDashboard(input: $input) {
    userGrowth {
      totalUsers
      activeUsers
      newUsers
      adminUsers
      growthRate
      periodStart
      periodEnd
      __typename
    }
    documents {
      totalDocuments
      completedDocuments
      draftDocuments
      failedDocuments
      generatingDocuments
      successRate
      periodStart
      periodEnd
      __typename
    }
    queries {
      totalQueries
      uniqueUsers
      avgQueriesPerUser
      totalCitations
      avgCitationsPerQuery
      periodStart
      periodEnd
      __typename
    }
    systemHealth {
      documentSuccessRate
      avgResponseTime
      activeSessions
      timestamp
      __typename
    }
    generatedAt
    __typename
  }
}

}

sha256:55d6167f0424fb0bd9f9fc72519d9ec80.name: MyBillingInfo
sha256:55d6167f0424fb0bd9f9fc72519d9ec80.body:
query MyBillingInfo {
  myBillingInfo {
    ...BillingInfoFragment
    __typename
  }
}

fragment BillingInfoFragment on BillingInfo {
  subscriptionId
  planTier
  planName
  status
  currentPeriodStart
  currentPeriodEnd
  daysRemaining
  cancelAtPeriodEnd
  usage
  nextBillingAmount
  paymentHistory {
    ...PaymentHistoryItemFragment
    __typename
  }
  paymentMethods {
    ...PaymentMethodInfoFragment
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment PaymentHistoryItemFragment on PaymentHistoryItem {
  id
  amount
  currency
  status
  method
  description
  invoiceId
  createdAt
  refundedAt
  refundAmount
  __typename
}

fragment PaymentMethodInfoFragment on PaymentMethodInfo {
  id
  brand
  last4
  expiryMonth
  expiryYear
  isDefault
  __typename
}

sha256:2fc9b64100b95775aadb3869dc698c202.name: GetChatSession

sha256:f76e12ab2056098d704752af7f8b3000c.name: GetChatSessions
sha256:f76e12ab2056098d704752af7f8b3000c.body:
query GetChatSessions($limit: Int = 20, $offset: Int = 0, $sortBy: String = "lastMessageAt", $sortOrder: String = "DESC", $mode: ChatMode, $isPinned: Boolean, $search: String, $includeDeleted: Boolean = false) {
  chatSessions(
    limit: $limit
    offset: $offset
    sortBy: $sortBy
    sortOrder: $sortOrder
    mode: $mode
    isPinned: $isPinned
    search: $search
    includeDeleted: $includeDeleted
  ) {
    ...ChatSessionFragment
    __typename
  }
}

fragment ChatSessionFragment on ChatSession {
  id
  title
  mode
  messageCount
  lastMessageAt
  createdAt
  updatedAt
  isPinned
  deletedAt
  __typename
}

  user(id: $id) {
    ...UserDetailFragment

}

  ...UserFragment
  disclaimerAccepted
  disclaimerAcceptedAt
  stripeCustomerId
  twoFactorEnabled
  createdAt
  updatedAt

  id
  email
  username
  firstName
  lastName
  isActive
  role
  roles
  __typename
}
